tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE coastal_erosion_data (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  erosion_rate DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  protection_measures TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE erosion_predictions (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_erosion_rate FLOAT
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES coastal_erosion(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE erosion_rates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  erosion_rate FLOAT,
  measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE coastal_areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  coastline_length FLOAT,
  exposure_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE protection_measures (
  measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_name VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  effectiveness_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE erosion_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  erosion_measurement FLOAT
)
